name: Hakuoki: Edo Blossoms
description:
As the Shinsengumi’s survival came under threat, they were faced with a choice: discard their principles, or give up their lives.


This is a story about a girl who allies with the warriors of the Shinsengumi, who are struggling to uphold their faith in an era of rapid social change in Japan, and the fate of
those who sought to resist that change... Find true love in the journey to Edo -- your choices decide your fate!


This remastered telling of the beloved visual novel Hakuoki series is a continuation of the Hakuoki: Kyoto Winds story and focuses on the story set in Edo, the second part in this two-part series.
